ftbquests.chapter.tier_2__polytetrafluor: Hello! If you are reading this you are too early! The pack is &6WIP&r! The quests here provide a quick overview of what is intended for the devin'
Chemistry! Brought to you by work place accidents
Chemistry and Industrial Accidents

Liquid Compressor, 
Thermo Compressor, \& 
Electrostatic Compressor 

will be the &6&nonly&r available compressors for air
Security Upgrades are being &cremoved&r
Certain recipes will &aAdd&r pressure to the chamber when they complete
Certain recipes will require &cred-zone&r pressures
Changes to Pressure
Certain recipes will have the capacity to &cfail&r if at the wrong &btemperature&r
Certain fluids will require being sustained &bcold&r or &chot&r to exist
Temperature
All elements and compounds will have &bice&r \& &egas&r versions and be able to tick into gas via Pollution Of The Realms
All elements and compounds will be registered with &btemperature properties&r to interface with pnematiccraft
Pollutions Of The Realms will &6NOT&r be the pollution system. That will be made in house and will be different. &aThis mod exists for the gas-mechanics&r
Chemlib \& Pollution Integration
Compression is a modpack that is striving to &6avoid magic-box type automations&r when better options exist
Mekanism and Thermal will be relying on a &afuture implementation of &bNBT-Tagged&r recipe modification&r
Mekanism and Thermal machines will exist not to produce products but &dmodify&r traits of existing items to then modify the behavior of recipes

&n&bAs an example:&r&r\nSpraying an item with &elubricant&r will grant it a &6+lubricated&r &etag&r, the Lathe in JEI will have a &d[!]&r which when hovered over will say "benefits from +lubricated". The resulting recipe will happen &dfaster&r than usual
Magic-Box Automation
Mekanism Lasers will be reworked to have &6swappable crystals&r
Different crystals will produce different bands of laser light, which will be components needed for chemical reactions early on
Much later on will exist &bexotic crystals&r for physics research
Rainbow Lasers
Turning things into other things
&6Tier 2&b - Polytetrafluoro...
ftbquests.chapter.tier_3__a_golden_box.q: Hello! If you are reading this you are too early! The pack is &6WIP&r! The quests here provide a quick overview of what is intended for the devin'
The Computation Age Begins
The &6Punch Card Computer&r will be a custom multiblock made for this tier
The type of task possible to roll depends on the &6size&r of the computer, more complex tasks will yield better &dquality \& quantity&r completed punch cards
If the input to the computer does not match the requested task the craft will &cfail&r and mangle your punch card
It will be a &b3x3xn&r structure, where the length of the machine represents the maximum size of instruction input/output
The basic idea of the structure is this:\n
On the front facing portion of the machine there will be a slot to &6input a punch card&r\n
Next to this &bitem input&r will be a &credstone input&r to start the machine
Once the machine starts &etwo&r distinct things will happen:\n
The top-front slot will output a &credstone signal between &61-15&r
Each signal will correspond to a different &a"task"&r and will interface with create display boards to show the task more directly
These &atasks&r are yet to be decided but will be explained in ponders
Turing Complete
&dHexcasting&r will be a mod accessable in Tier 3
Hexcasting is a &6programing based magic mod&r where one draws symbols in a sequence to form &elogical statements&r which then execute
The real power and relevance to &bCompression&r is in the ability for these instructions to be physical multiblocks entirely constructed by the player
These structures can be triggered by redstone and be as complex or simple as desired
Getting Hexical
Botania's &aPortal to Alfheim&r is often overlooked in modpacks and is treated as a "thing to thing" converter without much else going on
The plan here is to treat it as a &6"lost archive"&r of information, a hologram of old lost knowledge
Throwing &6parchment&r into the gateway will return a random string of characters in an &bunknown language&r
Your task will be to decript it and gleen information relevant to production methods and secrets in world
And it will have to be automated ;)
Alfemic Linguistics
Ae2 &bAutocrafting&r Finally!
Ey ey ey, not so fast, this is &6Compression&r so there has to be a new suffering method for things considered easy or overpowered
As part of the Crafting CPU multiblock there will be a &bnew block&r called the &aFlopotron&r
When requesting a craft a new consumed unit called &d"flops"&r will be needed for every operation the CPU does
To gain &d"flops"&r the Flopotron must be fed completed computational tasks from either the &6punchcard computer&r or an equivalent &6hexcasting sourced rune&r
At the end of Tier 3 you will begin work on a &alibrary of life&r
This will be important for starting &2Tier 4&r as that is a heavily biology focused chapter
Hope you like &6statistics&r!
Biological Database
Tier 3's Ore scaler
Specifics yet to be decided
ftbquests.chapter.tier_4__deoxyribonucle: Hello! If you are reading this you are too early! The pack is &6WIP&r! The quests here provide a quick overview of what is intended for the devin'
Horrors well within comprehension
With hunger not being a thing here, food recipes can be just as &chorribly complicated as real life&r!
Food will exist for 3 things:
&bInstant healing \& buffs for the player
&aVillager Trading
&bFeedstock for modified animals
Food
A large portion of early gene editing technology relies on &aviruses and bacteria&r to inject gene segments into plants
A massive portion of early Tier 4 will involve their cultivation, replication, and modification
Virology \& Bacteria
&aPlants&r will be the first victims of your genetic tinkering
Certain species of bacteria can forcefully insert plasmids into plant cells to alter their behavior, and naturally this process can be changed
Plant Modification
&bMystical Agriculture&r will be the tier 4 ore-scaling
This mod will not be an infinite resource sink and will have its own &acustom system&r bridging to &bpneumaticcraft&r
The seeds will &cnot&r be replicatable from the crops and must be made continuously as the plants are &csterile&r
The growth of the crops will be in a &6"simulated climate"&r chamber involving &epressure, temperature, atmosphere, and nutrients&r
Failing any of these conditions will result in either the plant dying or a &crapid unscheduled dissassembly&r of the machine
Mystical Agriculture
https://bmcbiotechnol.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12896-018-0495-1
Chickens can be gene edited to make &6drugs&r! As if chickens arnt abused enough in minecraft
Egg.Inc
How to scale animal and mob products without killing my game? You give them &6horrible genetic deformities!&r
You will gain the capacity to produce &6viral vectors&r for &6baby animals&r that, once grown up, will result in extremely visually messed up animals that specialize in a drop or two
These traits are &cnot heritable&r and thus will require a fresh stream of baby animals to maintain
Beyond modification of baby animals a zygote chain \& implantation will enable &bmass produced modified life&r
Modified animals will require &especial diets&r and &econstant medical upkeep&r to keep alive long enough to be butchered
Animal Modification
Implementation specifics are yet to be decided, but the &chorrors&r continue
Into Biomancy
&4The horrors grow&r
Secret Last Step
Modification of life will require an understanding of &6rational drug design&r and &6genetic engineering technologies&r
Animal research involving different &eorgan systems&r, &estem cell culturing&r, and often cruel experiments are needed to gain a deep understanding of molecular machinery and what makes life tick

Which means yes, we will be diving into the research side of biology involving &cgenerated cancers, optogenetic brain manipulation, fetal tissue derived cell sources&r, and all sorts of morally toe curling science. This pack will not lessen the science
Anyways who wants to give dogs &cb&6r&ea&ai&bn &dc&ca&6n&ec&ae&br&r?
Genetic Pharmaceuticals
Life is chemistry in motion
&6Tier 4&b - Deoxyribonucleic Acid
Hello! If you are reading this you are too early! The pack is &6WIP&r! The quests here provide a quick overview of what is intended for the devin'
Time to crack some atoms
Nuclearcraft reactors are nice and all, but once you build one it just sits there converting items to power
The planned twist-up is a &bNeutron Bombardment&r mechanic

In real life material close to &eheavy neutron sources&r (aka the heart of the reactor) are subject to having the neutrons &ccombine with the nuclei&r of the atoms in said material, become unstable, and decay while still being part of the physical structure of the reactor. This leads to &cweakening of the material and in some cases becoming radioactive&r
&nHow this will translate to gameplay is this:&r
When a reactor finishes processing &afuel&r the internal components, rods, coolers, graphite blocks, ect will have a chance to convert to an &eirradiated version of themselves&r
These irradiated blocks will &cnot function&r and be &cunbreakable&r, but still remain &nmovable&r
These irradiated blocks can be &6refurbished&r if a special liquid is placed next to them to replicate cooling pools irl
The goal as the player is to design your reactor in a way where per cycle it can be &6gutted, replaced, and rerun automatically&r
Neutron Bombardment
&bCompression&r will feature another overarching mechanic for &citem decay&r
The plan is to implement it similar to &aVintage Story&r where decay time is tied to world tick age as a method to minimize lag from ticking entities
The relevance here is of course nuclear material is unstable and &nwill&r &crot away&r in storage meaning your reactors must be &bflowing at all times&r
Decay!
&dCorium&r is a liquid produced by &cmelting down nuclear reactors&r in a &ccatastrophic failure&r
This is a modpack about automating &beverything&r
I'm sure you know where this is going, you are smart, I believe in you
Physics research often requires &especific isotopes&r of elements to gain clearer insights into underlying nuclear mechanisms
Production of isotopically pure samples involves either &bbombarding&r small samples of very pure material then undergoing &bchemical seperation&r, or like &c11tybillion centrifuges&r
Fusion in &dTier 7&r will be the method to produce massive amounts of specific isotopes of material, but will not include the full selection

&aNuclear material&r is a slightly different case due to methods such as &egaseous uranium hexafluoide membrane seperation&r methods existing, meaning the &c"terrible" methods wont apply to the thing you need to scale right away
&b&nThis also means chemlib will be getting a "full" periodic table&r&r
Isotopic Isolation
Material gathered from refurbished nuclear components will be used for Tier 5's ore-line boost
Irradiated Ore
Twisting the dragon's tail
&6Tier 5&b - Glowing Green
ftbquests.chapter.tier_6__5_billion_per_: Hello! If you are reading this you are too early! The pack is &6WIP&r! The quests here provide a quick overview of what is intended for the devin'
7 nanometers each
7nm Thinking Metal
Tier 6 will focus almost exclusively on &6one&r production chain
&bThe 7nm architecture cpu/gpu/ram silicon wafer&r
There will be massive machines, many machines, processing steps that unironically take &6hundreds of cycles to finish&r
The goal is to follow &areal-life processes&r as close as is possible within the limitations of the game
Time to build a city sized cleanroom :fire:
Taiwan Simulator
&bMasks&r used in the &dUltraviolet Lithography&r steps are extremely important as they determin how good your chips are
The idea is to let you &adesign a mask&r by plotting out a square on the ground and building out &credstone&r.
The redstone will then be tested for &a"speed"&r at whatever task the mask is being made for.
However it performs will determin the &6quality of the mask&r, which determins how &6productive&r that step in the crafting chain will be
Mask Production
Now you may of seen the &a"make everything"&r part of the pack and then seen the &cmassive variation in building blocks&r and gotten worried
You can plug these machines into eachother and after chewing through the &6energy production of a whole country&r and a &cfew billion items&r, it will be "good enough" to use
Fear not for there is a plan to make this &6not awful&r
There will be &ntwo new machines&r involved in this:
&b&nSmall Scale Universal Clanking Factory&r&r\n
This factory will be fed a series of &estock-items&r where it will then randomly produce an item considered decorative/building (at a massive cost)
Initially this will be &cslow and wasteful&r
The resulting output will then be fed into a second machine:
&b&nBGPT-9000 (Block GPT:tm:)&r

This machine at great energetic cost will consume decorative blocks and produce optimization related data which when recombined with other science will produce optimization cards that will boost the efficiency of the universal factory

A Fancy Wrench

I Rember

ftbquests.chapter.welcome_to_compression: Эта сборка по дизайну выполнима без использования книги заданий!
&6Автоматизация и ВЫ! Cлужит как источник подсказок и объяснений более комплексных аспектов сборки, для тех, кто чувствуют себя потерянным или неуверены как что-то автоматизировать.\u0026r
&bКороче говоря&r, книга заданий существует как гид для
людей, запутавшихся в спагетти из рецептов, и направляет к
&bКое что важное:&r в этой книге нет наград, только информация.
Как вы можете заметить, есть много-много &cнезавершенных&r заданий в 1 тире, и тиры после него &cпустые.&r
Compression - это &6очень долгосрочный проект&r, как и GTNH. Это значит, что с каждым обновлением добавляется больше и больше контента навсегда и навечно.
Несмотря на то, что так мало всего выглядит завершенным, плотность и сложность заданий после 0 тира очень высокая, и их вполне достаточно для &a нескольких сотен часов &r игры.
Все недоделанные квесты имеют &3такую-же иконку, как и этот&r, для читаемости.
Если вы решите остаться до следующих обновлений, спасибо! А если нет, я рад, что вы хотя бы попробовали мой проект. &c<3&r
Задания по плотности примерно как звезды.

В разделе &b&nМасштабирование производства&r показано, какие рецепты, &dнаиболее важные для прогресса&r, получают новые версии. Имейте в виду, что у большинства рецептов есть &6масштабируемые версии&r, и этот набор заданий показывает только самые важные из них.
&n&cПуть к Нулю&r - это основная линия прогрессии. Здесь даётся немного информации и начинается смутный путь к "следующему шагу".
&n&dАвтоматизация и ВЫ!&r включает &b три основные группы&r-
> В разделе &a&nПромышленные инструменты&r находятся информационные вкладки с полезными инструментами, которые помогут вам в выполнении различных задач на вашей базе.
> Выполняйте задания в разделе &a&nМастерство&r что бы получать &6золотые ягоды&r показывающие ваши успехи в определённом тире.

> В &bдополнительных главах-руководствах&r содержится более подробная информация о соответствующих тирах на &cпути к нулю&r для тех случаев, когда вы &eне уверены, как лучше всего действовать&r между основными шагами. Задания здесь &aгораздо подробнее рассматривают игровую механику и философию дизайна сборки, что делает фабрику хорошо функционирующей&r. Для &bигроков, только осваивающих базовую автоматизацию :&r Вы очень смелы, если выбрали &dCompression&r, как свою первую сборку.

&a&nХимия и ВЫ!&r Это глава, в которой нет наград в виде ягод, и она существует для того, &6чтобы распутать еще несколько безумных химических цепочек,&r поскольку поиск JEI может немного &cзапутаться&r, когда рецепты становятся более абсурдными.
